svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The vertical axis shows self-reported life satisfaction in the Cantril Ladder (0-10 point scale with higher values
representing higher life satisfaction). The horizontal axis shows the share of children that die in the first 5 years of
Source: World Happiness Report (2018), World Bank
